characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If your army is Battle-forged, all INFANTRY, BIKERS and HELBRUTE units in a NIGHT LORDS Detachment gain the following ability: Models in enemy units must subtract 1 from their Leadership characteristic for each unit with this trait which is within 6" of theirs (to a maximum of -3).

profiles.name: Terror Tactics
profiles.book: Codex Heretic Astartes - Chaos Space Marines
